name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have a strong command of cloud technologies including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Terraform**, alongside expertise in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Jenkins**, and **Ansible** for CI/CD automation and continuous deployment. My solid foundation in **Python** and proficiency in scripting with **Bash** and **Ruby** aids in developing and optimizing cloud-based solutions. I am also experienced in deploying and managing applications with a thorough understanding of network stack components, DNS, and HTTP APIs.
I have led the development of high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My hands-on experience in building microservices architecture and event-driven systems complements my skill set in monitoring and observability tools including **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **Graphite**. With a track record of implementing robust MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, I am committed to delivering secure, high-quality cloud-based applications.
